name: Treasure Scavenger Hunt Games
description:
A mythical land has been attacked by monsters. These monsters are under control of two twin brothers. People of sacred mushroom town have summoned a strong princess. Before she could help, the mushroom town was deserted. People left to save themselves from monsters. Player must guide the princess to achieve her goal. The brave princess will use her bionic arm to wield a powerful staff. This is only weapon capable of defeating those monsters. She will have to navigate her way through various tough terrains.

Use joystick control the character, avoid all the obstacles and search for treasures chest for unlocking new levels.
